channel.title: 2 glitches
channel.description:
Testscape based
When you use range on players and they leave wild(walk out or tele) you keep shooting them.... also when you use magic on players all it does is give them 99hp...lol does anyone know whats wrong?

item.title: 2 glitches
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

When you have the level and runes and cast a magic attack on someone there hp goes to 99…I went and testsed a non modified testscape and the same thing happens…it shows that you hit but it actually gives them 99hp lol[br][size=1]Posted at: September 12, 2006, 06:54:04 AM[/size][hr]so no one knows?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 12, 2006, 07:12:31 PM[/size][hr]lolz this sucks[br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 06:21:02 PM[/size][hr]omfg does no one know?

Read full topic
